tool_description: Provides Google search results in JSON format. Its features include web search, image search, autocomplete, and trending search.
name: Google Search JSON
title: Google Search JSON

api_list.name: /search/image
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to perform image search using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with parameters like **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of images), **start** (starting index of results), and others. The request will generate a JSON response containing information about images that match the search query

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

optional_parameters.name: lr
optional_parameters.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The index of the first result to return

optional_parameters.name: gl
optional_parameters.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

api_list.name: /search/web
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to perform text search on the web using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with various parameters such as **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of results), **start** (starting index of results),  and more. The request will return search results in JSON format containing information such as titles, URLs, and descriptions of the search results.

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The index of the first result to return

optional_parameters.name: gl
optional_parameters.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

optional_parameters.name: lr
optional_parameters.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language
